She has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops and fattening up cattle for more than 10 years, earning approximately $1 per day. Her husband sells sugarcane juice, earning about $6 daily. Sophea is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a juice-squeezing machine to use in her husband's business. This money will help him generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a juice-sqeezing machine to use in her husband's beverage business.

loans.name: Davann

texts.en: Davann is 37 years old, married and lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a hospital for more than five years, earning approximately $5 each day. Her husband is a security guard who earns about $3 daily. Davann is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase construction materials to build a new house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a poultry farm to earn more income to support the family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house.

loans.name: Sokhan

texts.en: Sokhan is 45 years old, married and blessed with two children. She resides in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working as a chef for more than four years, earning about $4 per day. Her husband is a security guard who earns about $4 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sokhan is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. In the future, she would like to run a food store and help her children earn bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Agabagaya Kyakaki Group

texts.en:
Robina is 32 years old.  She is married and has four children.  She lives in Masindi, Uganda. She is a farmer, and, with the income earned, she has been able to buy land and expand her farming activities.  Unpredictable seasonal weather and price fluctuation are the main challenges she is facing.  Her dream is to educate her children, build a permanent home and hire employees to help expand her business.
She is a member of the above mentioned group where members guarantee each other in order to access a loan.  Robina wants a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: No

texts.en: No is 32 years old, married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been a farmer since 1998, earning about $4 per day. Her husband runs a business buying and selling cattle. He earns about $5 each day. All of their children are students. Each month, she spends $45 on food, $5 on utility expenses and $21 on other expense. No is requesting a loan of $1,000 to buy more cattle for trading. This money will help her make more income for her family to attain a good living standard. In the future, she would like to expand her business, decorate her house and help her children get a higher education.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for trading.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is 29 years old.  She is married and is charged with the responsibility of looking after her four children.  Her husband gave her capital to start up the business.   Her major challenge is customers not paying on time, which hinders her business. Her dream is to build a permanent home and move her business to a more permanent location.  Christine needs the loan to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en: Robina wants a loan to buy charcoal to sell.  She is aged 45 and is married.  She has two children, and she lives in Masindi, Uganda. She has been selling charcoal for eight years.  She used her personal savings to start her business.  Her major challenge is customers not paying on time.  She has goals of educating her children, building a permanent home, and moving the business to more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Bena

texts.en: Bena is a widow, aged 55, who is living in Masindi, Uganda.  She deals in a produce business which she has operated for 30 years. With the proceeds, she has been able to buy land and pay school fees for her children, who are now graduates. She has challenges of high fuel and transportation costs, as well as theft.  Her dream is to operate a food store.  Bena wants a loan to buy produce such as beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy produce such as beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Empresarias Group

texts.es: Thamy de 32 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 2 hijos los cuales dependen de ella. Lleva 4 años como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de lentes y cosméticos desde hace 3 años aproximadamente. Comenzó con la idea de incrementar sus ingresos y así también mejorar su calidad de vida. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo ha logrado construir su casa y ha podido dar educación a sus 2 pequeños hijos. Actualmente su ingreso lo destina a cubrir todos los gastos de casa, ya que es la única persona que solventa su hogar. Su plan para el futuro es comprarse un auto para que distribuya sus productos. Thamy usó el crédito en la compra de mercadería para su negocio, ya que en estas fechas sus ventas tienden a incrementarse por las celebraciones de Fiestas Patrias. Ella pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Mujeres Empresarias”, el cual está conformado por 10 personas  y lleva el cargo de presienta desde hace 4 meses.
texts.en:
Thamy is 32 years old, single and has two children who depend on her. She has been a client of Edaprospo for four years, and she has been selling glasses and cosmetics for approximately three years.  

She started with the idea of increasing her income and, at the same time, improving her quality of life. With her effort and work she managed to build her home and she has been able to educate her two young children. Currently, she uses her income to cover all the household expenses, since she is the only person supporting her home. Her plan for the future is to buy a car to distribute her products. 

Thamy used the loan to buy merchandise for her business, because at this time her sales tend to increase because of the National Holidays. She belongs to the communal bank "Mujeres Empresarias", which consists of ten people and she has held the position of president for four months.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Marié à une revendeuse, père de 04 enfants dont 03 scolarisés, Mr Koffi soucieux de l’avenir de sa famille a commencé par vendre depuis 2010 de la boisson. Son activité se fait dans un bar et ses clients ne cessent de s’accroitre de jour en jour en cette période de vacances. Pour mieux les satisfaire, il sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour s’approvisionner en boissons, en tables et chaises.  Il veut dans l’avenir, transformer le bar en maquis et assurer un avenir meilleur à ses enfants. Notons que ses enfants sont âgés de 12, 09,07 et 02ans. Son approvisionnement se fait au marché chez les grossistes.
texts.en:
Married to a retailer and the father of four children, three of whom are in school, Koffi, concerned about the future of his family, began selling drinks in 2010.  His business is carried out in a bar, and his customers are increasing day by day during the vacation season. 

To ensure more customer satisfaction, Koffi has requested an initial loan from WAGES to stock up on drinks, tables and chairs. In the future he wants to transform the bar into an eatery and ensure a better future for his children, aged 12, 9, 7 and 2 years old.  His supplies are bought from wholesalers at the market.

loans.use: To buy drinks, tables, and chairs

loans.name: Lino

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério da Educação há bastante tempo e também tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos de corte. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, vacinas, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade dos frangos para conseguir responder a demanda.
No futuro deseja aumentar a capacidade do seu negócio e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e a constante subida dos preços.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married father of two children, who both attend school. He lives in his own home with his family and does not support anyone else.
He has been a teacher and a member of staff at the Ministry of Education for quite some time, and he also runs his own business raising and selling broiler chickens. He intends to use this loan to buy chicks, vaccines, feed and vitamins in order to increase the size of his flock so that he can fulfill his orders.
In the future he hopes to increase the size of his business and improve his family's standard of living. Consequently, he promises to repay his loan in full so that he can apply to Hluvuku again.
The biggest challenges he faces are the high cost of living and the ever-increasing prices.

loans.use: to buy chicks, vaccines, feed, and vitamins in order to increase the size of his flock so that he can fulfill his orders.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is 36 years old.  He is married and has five children.  He is living in Hioma, Uganda. He is a farmer and has been in the agricultural sector for a long time.  He grows maize and rice for sale.  He faces the challengesof inadequate capital to purchase the necessary inputs.  He wishes to build a permanent house for his family, expand his business to new markets, and hire employees to help expand his farming activities. Moses intends to use the loan to buy maize and rice for planting.

loans.use: to buy maize and rice for planting.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en: Winfred requested a loan to buy cassavas to sell.  She is a thirty-two-year-old married woman with six children living in Masindi, Uganda.  She sells food and charcoal, and got the start up capital from her husband.  Customers not paying on time hinders her business.  She desires to build a permanent home and buy land to grow crops.

loans.use: buy cassavas to sell

loans.name: Kunthea

texts.en:
Kunthea is 41 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampot Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up pigs for more than ten years, earning approximately $7 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Kunthea is requesting a loan of $1300 to purchase more farmland to use for cultivating agricultural crops. This money will help her expand her business and earn more money to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: buy farmland to grow crops

loans.name: Mab

texts.en:
Mab is 44 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up cattle for more than four years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 per day. 

Mab is requesting a loan of $400 to purchase bricks and cement to use for constructing her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a small pig farm and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: buy materials to build her house

loans.name: Pek

texts.en:
Pek is 24 years old. She is married and blessed with one child.  They live in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia.  Pek is a homemaker. Her husband is employed in a hotel and earns about $5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Pek is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce the expenses of transportation. In the future, she would like to run a clothes shop and send her child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: buy a motorbike to commute to work

loans.name: Yom

texts.en:
Yom is 57 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children (a daughter and a son) in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her daughter is employed in a restaurant and earns $4 daily. Her son is a construction worker who earns about $4 each day. 

Yom is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase timber to build a new house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family.  In the future, she would like to run an additional business in order to make more money to financially support her family.

loans.use: buy timber to build a new house

loans.name: Soch

texts.en:
Soch is 54 years old. She is married and blessed with two children.  They live in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. Soch has been involved in growing rice and worked as a cleaner for more than seven years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $8 daily. 

Soch is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase seeds and fertilizer to use for cultivating rice. In the future, she would like to run a business producing concrete chairs and tables to sell and to help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Sulaiman

texts.en: Sulaiman wants a loan to buy produce such as groundnuts and maize to sell.  He is aged 45 and is married.  He has two children and he lives in Masindi –Uganda.  He buys cereal grains, grinds them, then sells at a marginal profit.  He has been in business for four years.  His dream is to educate his children and diversify the business, despite challenges in price fluctuation and inflation.

loans.use: to buy produce, such as groundnuts and maize, to sell.

loans.name: Sineat

texts.en: Sineat is 49 years old. She is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than four years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice and rubber plants to sell, and earns about $16 daily. Two of her children are employed as rubber plant workers and earn about $10 each day. Sineat is requesting a loan of $1000 to pay for the expenses of hiring laborers to cultivate the rubber plants. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house to make it more convenient for the family.

loans.use: to pay for the expenses of hiring laborers to cultivate the rubber plants

loans.name: Manuel Jose

texts.es:
Manuel tiene un almacén donde vende toda clase de productos a sus clientes como juguetería, productos de uso personal, productos de decoración para el hogar y otros más, el cual es su fuente de ingresos y la fuente de ingresos para su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, y es gracias a este negocio que han logrado salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades y también ha podido brindarles a sus hijos el acceso a una educación de buena calidad. Hace un tiempo cuando inició su negocio comenzó ofreciendo una cantidad muy reducida de mercancía, y debido a esto sus ventas eran muy esporádicas dado que sus clientes no tenían confianza de comprar en su negocio; sin embargo, gracias a la buena atención que siempre ha caracterizado su negocio logró hacerse conocer de muchas personas y así poco a poco salir adelante con su almacén. La ventaja que siempre ha tenido es que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy amable y generoso, y esto le ha permitido conocer a muchas personas de su municipio y por tanto hacer que los clientes de su negocio aumenten considerablemente. En los próximos meses uno de sus hijos comenzará la educación universitaria, y debido a los altos costos que esto trae consigo, Manuel debe aumentar sus ventas para poder contar con el dinero suficiente para sostener sus gastos universitarios; es por esto que ahora busca un préstamo para comprar artículos de uso personal y juguetería que ahora no tiene la oportunidad de ofrecer en su almacén y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes para que sus ventas aumenten considerablemente.

De esta manera logrará tener mayores ventas y así unos ingresos con los que podrá sostener los gastos universitarios de su hijo mayor. Además, seguirá teniendo satisfechos a sus clientes y esto le permitirá seguir creciendo para que en su hogar sigan contando con los ingresos que les permite tener una buena calidad de vida y muy buenas oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Manuel has a store where he sells all sorts of products to his customers, such as toys, personal products, decorative items for the home, and other products.  This business is his source of income and the source of income for his home, where he lives with his wife and their 2 children.  Thanks to this business, he has managed to get ahead in spite of the adversity he has faced, and he has also been able to provide his children with access to a good quality education.  

Some time ago, when he started his business, he was offering a very small quantity of merchandise for sale and so his sales were sporadic as his customers did not have confidence in buying from his shop.  However, thanks to the good service he provides in his business, he has managed to make himself known to a lot of people and so has gradually made progress with his business.  One advantage that he has always had is that he is known to be a very friendly and generous person.  This has allowed him to get to know a lot of people in his town, and as a result the clientele of his business has increased a lot.  

In the coming months, one of his sons will start at the university, and since this brings considerable costs Manuel must increase his sales so that he will have enough money to pay the university fees.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan to buy personal products and toys that up until now he has not had the opportunity to sell in his store.  This way, he will have a greater variety of products for his customers so that he can increase his sales.  

In this manner, he will achieve greater sales and so will have more income that he can use to support his oldest son's university studies.  Also, he will continue to have satisfied customers, which will help him to grow the business so that he can continue to rely on income that will support a good quality of life and good opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy personal products and toys to sell

loans.name: Phors

texts.en: Phors is 40 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She and her husband are sculptors who earn about $10 each day. Her son helps her run the business. Her daughter runs a food store. She earns about $3 daily. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Phors is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. In addition, a part of this money is used to buy the tree trunks to use for sculpting. This money will help her expand her business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family, and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Chanthy

texts.en: Chanthy is 29 years old. She is married and blessed with two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is employed in a pig farm and earns about $4 daily. In order to improve her family’s finances, Chanthy is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase insecticide, fertilizer and seeds to use in cultivating vegetables. This money will help her run additional business and earn more money to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to breed pigs and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase insecticide, fertilizer and seeds to use in cultivating vegetables

loans.name: Nara

texts.en: Nara is 43 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a soldier who earns about $5 each day. Her son is a driver who earns about $7 per day. Nara is requesting a loan of $700 to buy a house to provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run an agricultural business and help her children earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a house to provide better living conditions for her family

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de pagnes depuis 1994, Mme Akouvi est mère de 02 enfants tous à l’école. L’ainé a 18 et le dernier 13ans. Son conjoint est électricien et son  activité se déroule dans un marché de la place lieu ou elle s’approvisionne également. Elle est une ancienne cliente de WAGES et est à son troisième crédit. Avec cet argent, elle aura le temps de s’approvisionner en pagnes. Elle veut augmenter son stock, maintenir son activité et répondre à toutes demandes de nouveauté.
texts.en: Mrs. Akouvi has been selling traditional colorful “pagnes” fabric since 1994. She has two children, both in school. The oldest is 18 years old, and the youngest is 13. Her husband is an electrician working a the local market where she also stocks up. She is a long-time WAGES client, now  on her third loan. She will use these funds to stock up on “pagnes” fabric. She would like to expand her stock, bolster her business and respond to customer demand for  new selection of goods.

loans.use: to buy traditional fabric.

loans.name: Sinang

texts.en: Sinang is 56 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling noodles and pancakes for more than ten years, earning approximately $15 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $5 daily. Her son is employed in a pure drinking water factory and earns about $3 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sinang is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase groceries to resell. This money will help her acquire the security to start the new business and earn more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to resell

loans.name: Sok Yoeurn

texts.en: Sok Yoeurn is 31 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 each day. She has been working ina  garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $3 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sok Yoeurn is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Alikul

texts.ru: Аликул проживает в Яванском районе. Ему 53 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Аликул уже четыре года как занимается растениеводством. В основном Аликул выращивает овощи. Он берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Alikul lives in the Yavan district.  He is 53 years old, married and has four children.  Alikul has been involved in agriculture for four years.  He primarily grows vegetables.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is a 33-year-old married man with three children living in Masindi, Uganda.

For 5 years, Joel has been operating a retail shop and also farming. With the proceeds from these businesses, he has been able to buy more land and pay school fees for his children.

Inadequate capital to purchase stock is his challenge, because the demand for the goods is very high. He desires to educate his children and expand his business into new markets. Joel needs the loan facility to buy general merchandise, such as soap and sugar, to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise, such as soap and sugar, to sell.

loans.name: Latifi

texts.ru:
Латифи проживает в районе Яван. Он родился 1966 году. Латифи добропорядочный гражданин Таджикистана. Он занимается животноводством. Разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
Латифи живет с женой. У него семеро детей.
texts.en: Latifi lives in the Yavan district.  He was born in 1966.  Latifi is a conscientious citizen of Tajikistan.  He is involved in animal husbandry and breeds cattle for subsequent sale.  He has been in this business for four years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase calves.  Latifi lives with his wife, and they have seven children.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Sarvarbi

texts.ru:
Сарварби жительница Яванского района. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Сын Сарварби работает на заводе. Сама Сарварби имеет среднее образование. Она занимается торговлей более пяти лет. Сарварби у себя дома открыла торговую точку, где продает одежду, материалы и ткани. 
Сарварби просит кредит для покупки школьных принадлежностей и школьной формы с целью увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Sarvarbi is a resident of the Yavan district.  She is 41 years old, married and has five children.  Sarvarbi's son works at a factory.  Sarvarbi has a secondary education.  She has been involved in sales for over five years.  Sarvarbi opened a retail outlet at home, where she sells clothing, supplies and fabrics.  Sarvarbi is requesting this loan to purchase school supplies and uniforms in order to expand the merchandise selection.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and uniforms

loans.name: Avazoy

texts.ru: Авазой жительница района Яван. Ей 51 год. Она замужем. У нее 9 детей. Авазой занимается животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. В этой области Авазой имеет хороший опыт. Животноводством она занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Avazoy is a resident of the Yavan district.  She is 51 years old, married and has nine children.  Avazoy is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds cattle at home.  Avazoy has good experience in this business.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for six years.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Khayrulo

texts.ru:
Хайруло проживает в районе Фархор. Ему 62 года. У него большая семья. Он женат, имеет шестерых детей. Еще у него имеются славные внуки. 
Хайруло более 22 лет занимается растениеводством. Он при доме имеет не большой участок земли, где выращивает овощи и зернобобовые культуры. Хайрулло просит кредит для повторного посева овощей.
texts.en: Khayrulo lives in the Farkhor district.  He is 62 years old and has a large family.  He is married and has six children.  He also has great grandchildren.  Khayrulo has been involved in agriculture for 22 years.  He has a small plot of land by his house, where he grows vegetables and legumes.  Khayrulo is requesting this loan for a repeat sowing of vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a gas stove, two large pans and raw materials to improve his production process for arepas [traditional corn breads].

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 57-year-old married man with 10 children living in Masindi, Uganda. The responsibility of looking after the family rests on him and his dream is to see all his children educated.

John is both a shopkeeper and fish monger, and has been in these business for 20 years. Price fluctuations and inflation are his major challenges; however, his dreams are to diversify the business to include farming, to expand his business, and to build a permanent house for residence.

John intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise, such as salt and cooking oil, to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise, such as salt and cooking oil, to sell.

loans.name: Seda

texts.en:
Seda is 31 years old. He is married and resides with his three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. He is a soldier who earns about $3 daily. His wife is a homemaker. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Seda is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase stocks of fish and poultry to breed in order to sell when they gain weight. This money will help him run an additional business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of fish and poultry to breed in order to sell when they gain weight

loans.name: Hoeurn

texts.en:
Hoeurn is 62 years old. She is married and lives with her five children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice for more than five years, earning about $2 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service. He earns about $3 daily. Four of her children are construction workers who earn about $12 each day. 

Hoeurn is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland

loans.name: Mashalin

texts.en:
Mashalin wants a loan to buy fish to sell. She is a 30-year-old married woman with two children living in Masindi, Uganda.

Mashalin has been selling fish for 7 years, and with the proceeds she has been able to pay school fees for her children.

High fuel and transportation costs are her major challenges, while her dreams are educating her children and moving her business to a more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 42-year-old married man with eight children living in Masindi, Uganda.

Moses has been running a metal workshop and he used his personal savings to start the business. Price fluctuations, inflation, and customers not paying on time are his major challenges. His dream is to educate his children and diversify his business.

Moses wants a loan to buy scrap metals to use in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy scrap metals to use in his workshop.

loans.name: Lai Heang

texts.en:
Lai Heang is 49 years old. She is married and lives with four children and a son-in-law in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling all kinds of drinks for more than 10 years, earning about $4 per day. Her husband is a security guard who earns about $2 each day. Her son-in-law is a photographer who earns about $2 each day. 

Lai Heang is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase a camera for her son-in-law. This will help her son-in-law to improve his business and to earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a camera for her son in-law

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch is 61 years old. She is married and lives with her three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband (shown above) is a construction worker who earns about $3 daily. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $6 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Touch is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase farmland to use for cultivating rice. This money will help her run an additional business and earn extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and to rebuild her house to make it bigger and much stronger to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for cultivating rice

loans.name: Khoeurn

texts.en:
Khoeurn is 33 years old. She is married and resides with her  three children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than two years, earning about $4 daily. Her husband (who joins her and their children in the picture, along with her neighbor's kid) runs a business of pumping air into bike and car tires, and fixing flat tires. He earns about $5 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Khoeurn is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase piglets to breed in order to resell when they gain weight. By doing so, she would earn additional income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for the family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to breed in order to resell when they gain weight

loans.name: Kikonda S&c Group

texts.en:
Jane is a 33-year-old married woman living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a personal goal of educating her children to attain degrees as minimum qualifications.

Jane is a farmer and has been working in the agricultural sector, which is very productive. She faces the hardship of unpredictable seasonal weather, which makes it hard to plan. She has a vision of buying land to grow more crops and diversifying the business to include a retail shop.

Jane needs a loan to pay school fees for her children. She is a member of the above mentioned group, in which each member guarantees the others and that is why there are seven members in the photo.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Fabio Antonio

texts.es:
Fabio se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos, y para generar los ingresos para su hogar tiene una tienda general donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar, licores, y además tiene unos billares que hacen que su negocio sea muy concurrido. Hace muchos años trabajaba en fincas y así generaba los ingresos para su hogar, pero debido a que los ingresos no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de todos los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio y con unos pocos ahorros que tenía comenzó ofreciendo productos de la canasta familiar en su casa. Con un gran esfuerzo logró sacarlo adelante y así ahora tiene una tienda general que le permite generar ingresos para que su esposa y sus 3 hijos tengan una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que su tienda queda ubicada en una vereda, la manera en que Fabio la surte es visitando el pueblo más cercano cada 2 días aproximadamente, pues como no cuenta con un gran capital no puede comprar abastecimiento para más días. Por esto ahora Fabio busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y licores en volumen para así no tener que visitar tan constantemente el pueblo donde surte su tienda y así ahorrar en gastos.

De esta manera sus beneficios aumentarán y espera que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fabio is married and has three children. To generate income to support his family, he operates a general store where he sells staple food products, alcohol and other items, and also has pool tables that keep his store busy. Many years ago, he worked on farms trying make a living and cover household expenses, but his salary was not enough to support his family, leading him to open his own business. With his small savings at the time, he opened his store out of his home and sold food items for daily consumption.

Through much effort, Fabio was able to get ahead, and he has grown his store into a general store, which generates income and helps him to support his wife and three children. Since his store is located on a sidewalk in a neighborhood, he makes trips into town every two days to stock the store. He must make frequents trips to stock his business, as he does not have the funds necessary to purchase several days worth of merchandise. Fabio is requesting this loan in order to purchase merchandise for his store in bulk, which will allow him to make fewer trips into town and save money on transit expenses.

He hopes that, with this support and opportunity, he can expand and grow his business and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk for his general store so that he can make fewer trips into town to stock his business, and therefore save money on transportation expenses.

loans.name: Minerva

texts.en:
Minerva and her husband are both farmers. They are raising their family in a village and planting and harvesting rice and vegetables to sell. They have been gifted with two children, and they want them to earn degrees and become professionals someday.

In this regard, Minerva is aiming to strengthen her home products business. She is applying for a 5000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy additional stocks of AVON, Tupperware, Natasha and MSE products to sell in her community. She believes that through patience and hard work, she will improve her business .

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of home and personal products to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Nabetangan, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина родилась 1978 году в Яванском районе. Она живет с мужем. У нее один ребенок. Муж Заррины зарабатывает строительными работами по найму. Сама Заррина имеет богатый опыт в области животноводства. Она в основном  разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Заррина хочет запастись кормом для скота. Она просит кредит для покупки корма для крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Zarrina was born in 1978 in the Yavan district.  She lives with her husband and has one child.  Zarrina's husband earns a living through construction work as a contractor.  Zarrina has a rich experience in the animal husbandry field.  She primarily breeds livestock at home.  Zarrina wants to stock up on livestock feed.  She is requesting this loan to purchase feed for cattle.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Gulijahon

texts.ru: Гуличахон проживает в районе Фархор. Ей 42 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Гуличахон занимается купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота на рынке. В этой области она уже пять лет. Гуличахон берет кредит для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Gulijahon lives in the Farkhor district.  She is 42 years old, married and has three children.  Gulijahon is involved in buying and selling cattle at a market.  She has been in this business for five years.  Gulijahon is requesting this loan to buy calves in order to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Maribel Del Socorro

texts.es:
Maribel se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que antes tenía un negocio de venta de pollos con el que contribuía económicamente junto con su esposo para que en su hogar pudieran tener mejores oportunidades económicas. El negocio lo tuvo que dejar de lado porque se tuvieron que pasar de vivienda y allí no había lugar para ubicar los corrales para los pollos; durante este tiempo la situación económica en su hogar fue muy complicada y pasaron por muchas dificultades. Ahora que se han pasado a vivir a otra casa y allí si hay lugar donde puede ubicar los corrales para los pollos, Maribel espera reiniciar su actividad para generar ingresos que ayuden en su hogar, es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar los pollos que requiere para reiniciar su actividad de venta de pollos.

Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener su casa propia para brindarles a sus hijos y su esposo un hogar estable, y también tener la oportunidad de ubicar mejor su negocio.
texts.en:
Maribel’s married and has two children she’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life for.  She used to have a business selling chickens that allowed her to contribute with her husband so that their home had more economic opportunities.  She had to leave the business aside because they moved and there wasn’t any room in the new place for corrals for the chickens.  

During that time their home economic situation became complicated and they went through many difficulties.  Now they’ve moved again and in the new place there is enough space to install corrals for the chickens.  Maribel hopes to restart her business to generate income to help at home which is why she needs a loan to buy the chicks she needs to restart her chicken sales business.  Her greatest dream is to own a house to provide her children and her husband with a stable home and also to have a place in which to better situate her business.

loans.use: to buy chicks.

loans.name: Nelson Javier

texts.es:
Nelson es una persona muy trabajadora y ha logrado sacar adelante a su hijo de 7 años a quien abandonó su madre desde hace un tiempo y así ha logrado sacar su propio hogar con mucho esfuerzo. Desde hace un tiempo aprendió la actividad de la cría de cerdos y con esto comenzó a generar ingresos extras a parte del trabajo que tenía donde generaba muy poco dinero para su hogar. Gracias a esta actividad de la cría de cerdos ha logrado generar ingresos extras para su hogar que le permiten brindarle a su hijo una buena calidad de vida para el hogar, por esto siempre busca la oportunidad de que su negocio siga creciendo para que su hijo tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital, Nelson recurre a un préstamo para comprar el cuido que requiere para alimentar los cerdos y así sacar su producción adelante.

De esta manera logrará sacar sus productos de buena calidad y recibir un buen ingreso por ello y así brindarle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida que la que puede acceder actualmente. Su mayor sueño es tener un buen negocio y conseguir la manera en que su hijo pueda tener una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Nelson’s a very hardworking person who has managed to move his 7-year-old son forward since his mother abandoned them some time ago.  He’s managed to support his home with much effort.  

For some time now he’s been in the pig raising business which generated extra income aside from his salary which was too low to cover all household expenses.  Thanks to this pig raising activity he’s earned extra income for his home that allows him to provide his son with a better quality of life at home which is why he’s always looking for opportunities for his business to continue growing so that his son can have still better quality of life.  
Because he does not have much capital, Nelson turns to a loan to buy feed he needs for his pigs thus moving production forward.

In this way he will manage to produce good quality product and earn good income by means of it to be able to provide his son with a quality of life that’s better than their current one.  His greatest dream is to have a good business and obtain the way of providing his son with a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Abduhamid

texts.ru: Абдухамид хороший семьянин и предприниматель, он женат и воспитывает 3 детей. Абдухамид в течении 4 лет занимается купля продажей корма для скота. Первый кредит получил в 2010 году, для увеличения товарооборота. В настоящее время от получившего кредита он разнообразил свой товар. Раньше он продавал только корм и сухую траву для скота, также добавил жмых. Он каждый раз за товаром ездит в город и в разные регионы на своем легковом автомобиле, но что бы привезти большой запас товара ему необходима большой грузовик.  Для этого на полученный кредит он хочет купить машину марки "Портер",и благодаря финансовой  поддержке он сможет за один рейс привезти больше товара и получить больше прибыли.
texts.en: Abduhamid is a good family man and entrepreneur.  He is married and raising three children.  Abduhamid has been involved in buying and selling livestock feed for four years.  He obtained his first loan in 2010 to increase goods turnover.  Since then, he expanded his merchandise selection with the help of that loan.  He previously only sold feed and dried grass for livestock and now added oil-cake.  He travels to the city and various regions for merchandise every time using his passenger car, but needs a large truck in order to deliver a large inventory of goods.  Abduhamid wants to use this loan to buy a "Porter" car and, thanks to the financial support, would be able to bring in more goods in one trip and make more profit.

loans.use: to buy a truck

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa inició su negocio hace aproximadamente 30 años cuando vio la oportunidad que había en el sector y decidió invertir unos ahorros que tenía comprando una casa donde luego con mucho esfuerzo le realizó algunas adecuaciones locativas para así tener unas 9 habitaciones aproximadamente y poder brindar un buen servicio de hospedaje y restaurante. Gracias a este negocio su familia ha logrado tener una mejor calidad de vida, principalmente sus 3 hijos quienes antes tenían que recurrir a una mala educación por las pocas oportunidades económicas que tenían. Actualmente Teresa tiene la necesidad de reparar su cocina para poder preparar los alimentos que ofrece a sus clientes en mejores condiciones, por esto busca un préstamo para arreglar la cocina donde prepara los alimentos para sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá tener un lugar con mejores condiciones y ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad que le permita tener mejores ventas. Su mayor sueño es seguir saliendo adelante y brindar una buena calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Teresa started her business approximately 30 years ago when she saw the opportunity that existed in the sector and she decided to invest some savings she had buying a house to which with much effort in time she added nine rooms approximately in order to provide room and board services.  

Thanks to this business her family has had a better quality of life, especially her three children who used to have to access a poor quality education because of their scarce economic resources.  Currently, Teresa needs to repair the kitchen in order to prepare the meals she offers her customers in better conditions which is why she’s looking for a loan to repair the kitchen where she prepares meals for her customers.  

In this way she will have a place that’s in better condition and will offer better quality of service that will bring more sales.  Her greatest dream is to continue moving forward and providing a good quality of life in her home.

loans.use: to repair the kitchen.

loans.name: Blanca Ligia

texts.es:
Blanca se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió buscar una manera de contribuir económicamente en su hogar para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Fue con unos ahorros y con un gran esfuerzo que puso que logró montar una tienda general desde su casa donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar a sus clientes. Ha sido muy difícil salir adelante con su tienda por el poco capital con el que cuenta, y es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá ir surtiendo poco a poco su negocio para que sus clientes puedan recibir un buen servicio en la tienda. Su mayor sueño es sacar esta tienda adelante y que gracias a esta pueda seguir ofreciendo en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Blanca’s married and has two children who are 18 and 12 years of age.  Because the income generated by her husband in insufficient to cover all household expenses, she decided to find a way to contribute economically to her home to provide a better quality of life for her children.  

She used some savings and much effort to open a general store at home where she sells basic staples to her customers.  Getting ahead with the store has been very difficult because of the little capital she has which is why she’s looking for a loan to buy basic staples and to increase the variety of products she offers her customers.  

In this way she will be able to gradually stock her store so that her customers can get good service there.  Her greatest dream is to succeed with the store so that thanks to it she can continue offering her home a better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.

loans.use: to buy basic staple items to stock her store.

loans.name: Ruben Darío

texts.es:
Ruben tiene desde hace 9 años su tienda general la cual abrió debido a que fue despedido de una empresa de vigilancia donde trabajaba y necesitaba generar los ingresos para su hogar y poderles ofrecer una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus hijos. Con muy poco capital que tenía ahorrado comenzó ofreciendo productos de la canasta familiar y gracias al gran esfuerzo que ha hecho ha logrado ir saliendo adelante poco a poco y superar las grandes dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida. Para ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos, Ruben busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera espera superar la dificultad de capital que tiene en su negocio y lograr salir adelante generando mejores ingresos para su hogar. Su mayor sueño es tener su casa propia para ofrecerle a su familia un hogar más estable, y también tener un gran negocio desde el cual pueda generar una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rubén has had a general store for nine years that he opened because he was let go from a security firm where he used to work and he needed to generate income for his home to offer a better quality of life for his wife and children.  With very little capital he had saved he started offering basic staples and thanks to the great effort he’s put into it he’s managed to gradually move forward and overcome the great difficulties life has presented him.  In order to offer his customers a wider variety of products, Rubén is looking for a loan to buy basic staple items and offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

In this way he hopes to overcome the difficulty he has with respect to business capital and manage to get ahead generating higher income for his home.  His greatest dream is to have a house of his own to offer his family a more stable home and also to have a great business that will generate better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy basic staples to stock his store.

loans.name: Maria Gertrudis

texts.es:
Maria era durante 30 años una vendedora ambulante que vendía frutas en la calle y desde hace 12 años gracias al gran esfuerzo que ha hecho con su trabajo logró montar en un local una tienda general donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a este negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos ya que es una madre soltera cabeza de hogar, y a estado muy agradecida de poderles brindar a sus hijos educación y un buen hogar. Con su negocio ha puesto un gran empeño en hacerlo crecer para poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, y por esto ahora busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y surtir su tienda con productos que se han ido agotando.

Su mayor sueño es seguir saliendo adelante y que sus hijos progresen, para que tengan las posibilidades económicas de que cuando formen sus familias puedan brindarles un buen hogar.
texts.en: María spent 30 years as an itinerant merchant selling fruit in the street but 12 years ago thanks to the great effort she put into her work she managed to open a general store where she offers her customers basic staple items.  Thanks to this business she’s been able to move her family of four children forward since she’s a single mother head of household; she’s very grateful to have been able to provide her children with a good home and education.  She’s put quite an effort into making her business grow in order to offer her children a better quality of life which is why she’s now looking for a loan to buy basic staple items to stock her store with products she’s run out of.  Her greatest dream is to continue moving forward and that her children make progress so that they will have economic possibilities so when they form their own families they will be able to provide them with a good home.

loans.use: to buy staple items to stock her store.

loans.name: Maria Cielo

texts.es:
Maria tiene varios años de experiencia en la actividad de la confección, pues trabajó durante un tiempo en una empresa de confección y ahora tiene su propio taller de confección en su casa donde ha logrado sacar su propia línea de vestidos de baño y ropa interior. Gracias a esta actividad ha logrado salir adelante y superar la dificultad de ser madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida. La principal dificultad que tiene en su taller de confección es la falta de capital para hacerlo crecer, pues gracias a que tiene muy buenos clientes, tiene grandes pedidos y muchos de ellos no los logra responder por la falta del dinero necesario para comprar la materia prima. Pero buscando mejorar esta situación Maria busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas como telas e hilos para producir un gran pedido de ropa interior que tiene por parte de un gran cliente.

Así logrará salir adelante a pesar de la dificultad de no contar con un gran capital en su taller de confección y podrá seguir generando ingresos que le permitan brindarles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Su mayor sueño es tener un taller mucho más grande y generar más empleo, ya que ahora puede generar 1 empleo.
texts.en:
María has several years’ experience sewing because she worked sewing in a firm for many years and now she has her own sewing workshop at home where she’s succeeded in creating her own line of swimsuits and underwear.  Thanks to this activity she’s managed to get ahead and overcome the difficulty of being a single mother head of household; she has two children who she’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life for.

The main difficulty her shop faces is lack of capital to grow because thanks to having many customers she has large orders but she’s unable to respond to some of them because she lacks the necessary money to buy raw materials.  Seeking to improve this situation, María is looking for a loan to buy raw materials like fabric and thread to fill a large underwear order she has pending for a customer.

She will thus be able to get ahead despite the difficulty of not having much capital in her workshop and will be able to continue generating income that will make it possible for her to provide her children with a good quality of life.  Her greatest dream is to have a much larger workshop and to generate more employment; she currently generates one job.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Eliecer

texts.es:
Jorge lleva varios años trabajando en su propia fabricación de implementos de aseo como escobas, traperos, cepillos, entre otros más, y con este negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia brindándoles una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Desde hace un tiempo que tenía un empleo y fue despedido, Jorge tenía grandes dificultades económicas y su esposa y sus hijos tenían que padecer grandes dificultades también, pero fue con su esfuerzo y lucha constante que logró sacar su propio negocio adelante y ahora puede generar ingresos con los que sus hijos pueden tener una educación de buena calidad y en su hogar hay una mejor estabilidad económica. Sin embargo, debido a que es hijo único, debe contribuir económicamente a su madre para que pueda tener una buena calidad de vida, y debido a que su madre ya no está en edad de trabajar, Jorge debe garantizar todo su sustento. Es debido a que su madre en estos momentos se encuentra enferma que debe busca la manera de que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente para poder sostener sus gastos médicos, y es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas para la fabricación de sus implementos de aseo y así responder a grandes pedidos que tiene para poder generar los ingresos que necesita para su madre.

De esta manera logrará brindarle lo necesario a su madre y también continuará generando los ingresos que requiere en su hogar. Su mayor sueño es poder sacar su negocio adelante y tener la posibilidad de generar empleo para mejorarles la calidad de vida a otras personas a través de su negocio.
texts.en:
Jorge has been working for several years manufacturing his own line of cleaning tools like brooms, mops and brushes, among others.  He’s supported his family by means of this business providing good quality of life for his home.  

Some time ago Jorge was employed but when he was let go from his job he faced great economic difficulties and his wife and children had to go through them too.  However, with much struggle and constant effort he was able to move his own business forward and in now able to generate income that allows his children to have a good quality education and there is better economic stability at home.  

However, because he’s an only child, he must contribute economically to his mother so that she can also have a good quality of life and because she is no longer of working age Jorge must support her.  Because his mother is currently unwell, Jorge is looking for a way to increase his income considerably to cover her medical expenses and this is why he’s looking for a loan to buy raw materials to manufacture his cleaning tools and be able to respond to large pending orders he has and generate the income needed for his mother.

In this way he will be able to provide what’s necessary for his mother and also continue generating income needed at home.  His greatest dream is to move his business forward and to be able to generate employment to improve the quality of life of other people by means of his business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Gabriela Del Socorro

texts.es:
Gabriela es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad. Gabriela es madre soltera cabeza de hogar debido a que es viuda desde hace un tiempo y esto ha hecho que su situación económica sea muy difícil, pero con su negocio ha tenido una gran fortaleza y ha podido salir adelante. Desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal y cuando su esposo murió le tocó incrementar sus ventas para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, y para lograrlo le tocó trabajar muy fuerte y luchar durante muchos días fuertemente. Actualmente Gabriela tiene unos grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a sus 3 hijos una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a very hardworking person who thanks to her daily efforts has managed to support her three children providing them with a good quality education.  Gabriela is a single mother head of household because she was widowed some time ago which has made her economic situation very difficult.  But with her business she’s had the strength to get ahead.  

For some time she’s been selling personal use products and when her husband died she had to increase sales in order to cover all household expenses.  To do so, she had to work very hard and struggle mightily every day.  

Currently, Gabriela has large pending customer orders but because she does not have capital is looking for a loan to buy personal use products to fill the large pending customer orders she has.  Her greatest dream is to get ahead with her business to be able to offer her three children a good quality of life and better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco comenzó con la actividad de venta de refrescos y helados debido a que sufrió de una enfermedad y fue despedido de su empleo. Al quedar sin empleo sufrió grandes dificultades económicas con su familia y fue con este negocio que logró salir adelante y poder ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Gracias a que ha puesto un gran esfuerzo en su negocio y ha tenido muy buenas ventas, Francisco busca un préstamo para comprar insumos como frutas y algunos insumos para la preparación de helados para responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con este negocio y que este le permita ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, además de recuperarse de su enfermedad en los huesos y también gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisco started selling soft drinks and ice cream when he became ill and lost his job. Because he was unemployed, he and his family suffered serious financial problems, and it was through this business that he managed to make progress and provide his family with a good standard of living. Because he works hard, sales are very good. Francisco is seeking a loan to buy ingredients such as fruit and also supplies so that he can make the ice cream and fulfill his customers' orders. 

His biggest dream is to make his business a success and be able to offer his family a better standard of living. He would also like to make a recovery from the sickness in his bones so he too can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: Buy fruit and other supplies to make soft drinks and ice cream

loans.name: Yorfi Ledy

texts.es:
Yorfi se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos de 9, 11 y 14 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no estaban siendo suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar decidió comenzar a trabajar en la actividad de la confección que ya conocía gracias a su madre. Fue así como desde hace 2 años montó con unos ahorros su propio taller de confección en su casa y ofrece a sus clientes el servicio de confección a terceros, y gracias a esto las dificultades económicas de su hogar han sido casi superadas y ahora pueden tener una mejor calidad de vida. Sus trabajos son reconocidos por tener muy buena calidad y esto le permite tener muy buenos pedidos, pero por la falta de capital que tiene no puede hacer crecer su negocio y responder a todos sus clientes, por esto ahora queriendo mejorar esta situación Yorfi busca un préstamo para comprar insumos como telas, hilos y agujas para confeccionar unos grandes pedidos que tiene por parte de sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá superar la dificultad de capital que tiene y su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante, permitiéndole tener una buena calidad de vida a su familia y mejorar la estabilidad económica del hogar.
texts.en:
Yorfi is married and has 3 children, aged 9, 11 and 14. Because her husband's income wasn't enough to pay for all of the household expenses, she decided to start working as a seamstress, which she learned how to do thanks to her mother. That was why, two years ago, she used her savings to open her own seamstress shop in her house and offer her customers her service for third parties. Thanks to this, the financial difficulties in her house have been nearly overcome and now they can have a better quality of life. Her work is known as being of good quality and this allows her to have very good orders. However, due to her lack of capital, she can't grow her business and respond to all of her customers. That is why she wants to improve this situation and Yorfi is sekking a loan to buy materials such as fabric, thread and needles to fill some big orders that she has from her customers.

In this way, she will be able to overcome the difficulty with the capital she has and her business will keep getting ahead, allowing her family to have a good quality of life and allowing her to improve her family's finances.

loans.use: to buy materials such as fabric, thread and needles to fill some big orders she has from her customers.

loans.name: Juan Guillermo

texts.es:
Juan se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos y para generar los ingresos de su hogar trabaja como mayordomo de una finca donde además de su salario puede tener unas vacas y así generar unos ingresos extras para su hogar. Gracias a esto, la situación económica de su familia ha mejorado desde que puede cuidar unas vacas en esta finca, y así sus hijos han podido tener una educación de mejor calidad y en su hogar tener una mejor estabilidad económica. Sus vacas producen leche que vende en su municipio, y gracias a la experiencia que tiene de unos 13 años ha logrado tener muy buenos clientes, tanto que sus pedidos actuales superan su capacidad de producción. Es por esto que Juan busca un préstamo para comprar una vaca y así aumentar su capacidad de producción de leche para responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su mayor dificultad es la falta de dinero para hacer crecer su negocio y con este préstamo podrá superar esta dificultad y continuar progresando junto a su familia, superando las grandes dificultades que le ha presentado la vida. Su sueño es llegar a tener su casa propia para darle a su familia un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Juan’s married and has three children.  In order to generate household income he works as a foreman on a large farm where in addition to his salary he’s allowed to keep a few cows to generate extra household income.  Thanks to this his family’s economic situation has improved since he’s been able to care for some cows on this farm; his children have had a better quality education and his home has better economic stability.

His cows produce milk that he sells in town and thanks to his almost 13 years’ experience he has very good customers so much so that current orders surpass his production capacity which is why Juan is looking for a loan to buy a cow to increase milk production capacity in order to fill customer orders.

His greatest obstacle is lack of money to make his business grow and with this loan he’ll be able to overcome this and continue making progress with his family overcoming the great difficulties life has presented him. His dream is to have a house of his own to give his family a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic bags to have the raw materials to fill the big beverage orders her customers have made.

loans.name: Elkin Arsecio

texts.es:
Elkin anteriormente trabajaba como vigilante y debido a que sus ingresos no eran suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus hijos, buscó la manera de montar una tienda general aprovechando las oportunidades del sector. Fue con muy poco capital que comenzó a ofrecer productos de la canasta familiar y con mucho esfuerzo poco a poco fue aumentando la variedad de productos que ofrecía a sus clientes. Ahora su negocio puede contar con una mayor clientela y puede ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos de la canasta familiar, de modo que la situación económica en su hogar ha venido mejorando poco a poco. Con el ánimo de seguir creciendo en su negocio y ofrecer mejores oportunidades económicas en su hogar, Elkin busca un préstamo para surtir su tienda general comprando productos de la canasta familiar.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene y así logrará tener un mejor negocio. Su mayor sueño es que su negocio le brinde a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación universitaria, y así superar las grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida.
texts.en:
Elkin used to work as a security guard, but since his income was not sufficient to support the expenses of his household, where he lives together with his wife and children, he looked into opening a shop, taking advantage of the opportunities of the sector. It was with very little capital that he started to sell the sorts of products which make up the average family shopping basket and with a lot of effort he slowly started to increase the variety of products he offered to his customers. Now his business has a larger customer-base and offers a wider variety of products for the family shopping basket, which has helped to slowly improve his household's financial situation. 

With the hope of continuing to expand his business and to offer his household better financial opportunities, Elkin is asking for a loan to buy products for the average family shopping basket as supplies for his general store. 

In this way he will overcome his capital problem and improve his business. His dream is for his business to provide his family with a better quality of life so that his children can have a university education and in this way to overcome the great challenges life has presented him.

loans.use: to buy products for the average family shopping basket as supplies for his general store

loans.name: Sigifredo De Jesus

texts.es:
Sigifredo es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre lo ha acompañado una fortaleza y unas ganas de salir adelante que le permiten superar las adversidades y continuar progresando junto con su familia. Hace 15 años salió desplazado por la violencia de su municipio natal donde tenía sus tierras y trabajaba en las labores del campo, pero lo tuvo que dejar todo y salir en búsqueda de una mejor calidad de vida y empezando desde cero. Fue así como lo primero que logró conseguir fue un puesto para vender buñuelos y poco a poco con un gran esfuerzo fue creciendo en su negocio. Ahora, gracias a su compromiso y dedicación en el negocio ha logrado conseguir su carro de comidas para ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos y busca un préstamo para comprar utensilios que necesita para la preparación de fritos en su carro de comidas.

De esta manera logrará superar estas adversidades y la situación económica en su hogar mejorará considerablemente, permitiéndole tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Sgifredo has had to overcome many problems in his life. However, his strong spirit and a desire to get ahead have allowed him and his family to overcome adversity. Fifteen years ago he had to leave his farm because of violence in the town where he was born. He had to leave everything behind and seek a better quality of life, starting from nothing. 

The first job that Sigifredo managed to find was selling doughnuts. Over time and with a lot of hard work, it grew into a business. Now through commitment and dedication he has managed to obtain a food cart and is able to offer a greater variety of products.

He is now seeking a loan to buy the utensils he needs to make fried foods in his cart. In this way he will succeed in overcoming the problems that have beset him, and his family's financial situation will be greatly improved. They will have a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy utensils to make fried foods in his food cart

loans.name: Ramon Ivan

texts.es:
Ramón inició hace 6 años con su tienda general ofreciendo productos de la canasta familiar, la cual inició con un pequeño préstamo y ofreciendo pocos productos a sus clientes. Gracias al esfuerzo que ha puesto en su negocio ha logrado sacar adelante las ventas y poco a poco aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Con su tienda, las condiciones económicas y de calidad de vida de su esposa y sus 4 hijos han mejorado considerablemente, por eso se siente tan agradecido con su tienda y siempre busca mejorarla para que sus hijos puedan en un futuro acceder a una educación universitaria. Ramón busca un préstamo para comprar una caba para ofrecer carne a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes y los ingresos en su hogar mejorarán considerablemente. Su mayor sueño es poder tener su casa propia y tener su negocio ubicado en ella, brindándole a su esposa y sus 4 hijos un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Ramon started up a general store 6 years ago where he sells consumer staples.  He started the business with a small loan, offering a small number of products to his customers.  Thanks to the effort that he has put into his business, he has managed to increase his sales and gradually increase the quantity of products he offers for sale to his customers.  With his store, his financial situation and the quality of life of his wife and 4 children have improved considerably.  For this reason, he feels very thankful to have his store, and he is always looking to improve it so that in the future his children will be able to have access to a university education.  Ramon seeks a loan to buy a goat so that he can offer meat to his customers.  

In this way, he will increase the variety of products that he offers his customers and his household income will increase a lot.  His main dream is to be able to have his own house and locate his business inside of it, providing his wife and their 4 children with a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy a goat so that he can offer meat to his customers

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis Aprendió por medio de un familiar la actividad de la preparación y venta de comidas rápidas, y comenzó con unos pocos ahorros una venta de empanadas y luego lo complementó con buñuelos y como el negocio iba creciendo y sus clientes le pedían pizzas, lasagnas, perros, hamburguesas y otras comidas rápidas más, Luis busca un préstamo para comprar un carro de comidas rápidas con el que pueda preparar las comidas rápidas que solicitan sus clientes. Así podrá satisfacer la demanda de sus productos y sus ingresos mejorarán considerablemente. Con este negocio Luis ha logrado generar los ingresos que son necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar y poder brindarles una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 14 y 19 años de edad. Su mayor sueño es poder tener su casa propia y brindarle a su familia un hogar más estable.
texts.en: Luis learned how to prepare and sell fast food from his family. With a little savings, he started to sell empanadas and later added buñuelos. As the business grew and his customers asked him for pizzas, lasagnas, hot dogs, hamburgurs and other fast foods. Luis is seeking a loan to buy a food cart where he can prepare the fast foods that his customers are asking him for. This way, he can meet the demand for his products and his income will improve considerably. With this business, Luis has been able to generate income necessary to pay for his household expenses and offer his wife and 2 children, aged 14 and 19 years old, a better quality of life. His biggest dream is to be able to own his own home and offer his family a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy a food cart with which he can prepare the fast food his customers are asking for.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a glass case to display other products, and to do maintenance on his bike cart

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grocery products such as pasta, breads, oil and other items.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto trabajaba administrando un restaurante y con ese empleo podía generar los ingresos para el hogar, pero el dueño del restaurante cambió y así quedó sin empleo, y para generar los ingresos que necesitaba en su hogar comenzó a vender tintos de manera ambulante. Comenzó con solo 3 termos de tinto y ahora con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado crecer poco a poco y sus clientes también han crecido, permitiéndole que sus ingresos aumenten y así su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Humberto esta buscando un préstamo para cambiar el carrito donde transporta sus productos y así poder ofrecer más productos a sus clientes.

Así logrará tener un carrito más grande donde le cabrán todos sus productos y así sus clientes estarán más satisfechos. Su mayor sueño es lograr generar ingresos para su hogar con los que su familia tenga la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Humberto used to work in a restaurant and earn money to support his family. However, the owner of the restaurant changed and he was left without a job. To generate the money that his family needed, he started to sell coffee in the streets. He started out with three thermoses of coffee, and now, after a great deal of effort, his business has gradually grown and he has many customers. His income has increased and his family can now enjoy a better standard of living.

Humberto is seeking a loan so he can change the little cart he uses to transport his products so he can offer his customers a wider variety of items. He wants to buy a larger more suitable cart so that his customers will be more satisfied.

Humberto's greatest wish is to earn more money so that his family can have the opportunity for a better standard of living and better economic opportunities.

loans.use: To buy a larger cart on which to transport coffee etc.

loans.name: Leopoldina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos de corte. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, vacinas, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade dos frangos e conseguir satisfazer a sua clientela.
No futuro deseja melhorar as condições de vida da sua família investindo ainda mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é sustentar os estudos dos seus filhos até alcançar o nível superior.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, all of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs her own business raising and selling broiler chickens. With the current loan she intends to purchase chicks, vaccines, feed and vitamins in order to increase the quantity of her chickens and keep her customers satisfied.
In the future she wishes to improve her family's living conditions by investing in her business even more. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is supporting her children's studies until they reach college.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, vaccines, feed and vitamins in order to increase the quantity of her chickens and keep her customers satisfied.

loans.name: Sang's Group

texts.en:
Sang is 55 years old. She has two children who are adults and have their own families. She has sold fresh fruits for a living for 12 years. From her small business, she gains 3,200,000 VND a month.
